name: Powershell Used To Disable Windows Defender AV Security Monitoring
description: Detects attackers attempting to disable Windows Defender using Powershell
false_positives: Minimal, for some older versions of dev tools, such as pycharm, developers were known to sometimes disable Windows Defender to improve performance, but this generally is not considered a good security practice.
query: ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\-[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ee][Hh][Aa][Vv][Ii][Oo][Rr][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*\-[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Uu][Nn][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/)) OR (process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Cc].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Pp].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd].*/) OR (process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Cc].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt]\=[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\-DisableBehaviorMonitoring\ $true* OR *\-DisableRuntimeMonitoring\ $true*)) OR (process.command_line:*sc* AND process.command_line:*stop* AND process.command_line:*WinDefend*) OR (process.command_line:*sc* AND process.command_line:*config* AND process.command_line:*WinDefend* AND process.command_line:*start\=disabled*))`
